text: News | NEWS & ANNOUNCEMENTS Dr. Sudhir Aggarwal receives NIJ award for AI Enabled Community Supervision for Criminal Justice Services Jan 31, 2020 Dr. Sudhir Aggarwal (Department of Computer Science) and Dr. Carrie Pettus-Davis (Department of Social Work) are co-PIs on a recently funded NIJ award for $1,999,778, entitled “AI Enabled Community Supervision for Criminal Justice Services.” read more Dr. Jie Yang awarded $459K NSF grant for Wireless Sensing Research Jan 22, 2020 Professor Jie Yang awarded $459k NSF grant for WiFi-based Ubiquitous Sensing read more « Older Entries Next Entries » STUDENT HIGHLIGHTS CS Student Presented in Top Supercomputing Conference. Nov 23, 2016 Jason Lee, a Master student from the CS	Department, has published a full paper in the prestigious	IEEE/ACM SC: the International Conference for High Performance Computing, Networking, Storage and Analysis, held in November 2016 in Salt Lake City, Utah. read more CS Student Presented in Top Data Science Conference Oct 21, 2016 Masters Student Presents at Top Tier Conference read more « Older Entries Next Entries »
